pageContext.claim: “Nancy Pelosi just got duped in an interview to admitting that she has been working on impeaching me for 'two and a half years.' In other words, she lied. This was the Radical Left, Do Nothing Democrats plan all along, long before the Ukraine phone call. Impeachment Hoax!”
pageContext.analysis: Some Trump critics have been calling for his impeachment for years. But House Speaker Nancy Pelosi (D-Calif.) rebuffed calls to impeach the president until she announced an inquiry into the Ukraine scandal in September. 2019 An intelligence community whistleblower sparked the inquiry in a complaint filed Aug. 12, which in turn was based on Trump's phone call with the president of Ukraine on July 25. That's a timeline spanning a few months, not two and a half years.
